description: Returns a unique symmetric data key for use outside of AWS KMS.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The symmetric data key can be used to encrypt or delete critical data, rendering it useless and causing operational disruptions.
The data key can facilitate the encryption of collected data before exfiltration to avoid detection.

incidents.description: Cloud Security Stories: From Risky Permissions to Ransomware Execution

securityImplications: Attackers might use GenerateDataKeyWithoutPlaintext to generate encryption keys that can decrypt data in a ransom.
